hotels.title: Luxurious 5-Star Hawke's Bay Countryside Escape with Fine-Dining Restaurant
hotels.description: Experience the rustic charm of Wallingford Homestead, a luxurious stay nestled in lush farmland near picturesque Hawke's Bay. Enjoy a secluded yet stylish escape near pristine rivers and with opportunities for bush walking and mountain biking. Sample the flavours of local artisan producers at the highly-acclaimed slow-concept fine-dining Wallingford Kitchen and spend your days lounging by the pool or at Porangahau Beach.
